levelBosses.name: Pitbull
levelBosses.description: The pitbull is a formidable opponent. It will charge at you and attack you if you get too close. Its attack is characterized by aggressive biting and a relentless charge. Its weakness is stick.

levelBosses.name: Wolf
levelBosses.description: The lone wolf is a formidable opponent. It will chase you relentlessly and attack you if you get too close. Its attack is characterized by swift, agile strikes. Its weakness is fire.

levelBosses.name: Bear
levelBosses.description: The bear is a formidable opponent. It will charge at you and attack you if you get too close. Its attack is characterized by heavy, crushing blows. Its weakness is bow.

levelBosses.name: Lion
levelBosses.description: The lion is a formidable opponent. It will charge at you and attack you if you get too close. Its attack is characterized by regal yet brutal strikes. Its weakness is fire.

levelBosses.name: Tiger
levelBosses.description: The tiger is a formidable opponent. It will charge at you and attack you if you get too close. Its attack is characterized by stealthy pounces and lethal claw slashes. Its weakness is gun.
